title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin likes what he's seen from Mac Jones and Patriots after a 5th straight win and why we shouldn't be surprised if the Patriots are a Super Bowl contender once again. He declares Dak Prescott has officially joined the "Confetti Club" as he prepares to go head to head against Patrick Mahomes and the Chiefs. He also shares his Blazing 5 picks for week 11 in the NFL. Plus, former Patriots QB Drew Bledsoe joins the show to set the record straight about his career and being replaced by Tom Brady.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
